Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 71st/M.L. King Drive
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, King Dr, 75th, Cottage Grove and 71st due to, street blockage near 71st/M.L. King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 71st, King Dr, 75th, Cottage Grove and 71st due to, street blockage near 71st/Martin Luther King Drive.

Allow extra travel time.
